detailed_results.question: What is the battery life of the Advantech EVA-2311 sensor and under what conditions is this achieved?
detailed_results.generated_answer: The battery life of the Advantech EVA-2311 sensor can last up to 5 years when operating at a temperature of 25°C with a 15-minute interval setting for data transmission.
detailed_results.ground_truth: The Advantech EVA-2311 sensor has a battery life of up to 5 years, achieved with a 15-minute data transmission interval at 25°C.
detailed_results.expected_response: The Advantech EVA-2311 sensor has a battery life of up to 5 years, which is based on a 15-minute data transmission interval at a temperature of 25°C.
detailed_results.expected_contexts: Excerpt 1 : Battery life up till 5 years @25°C 15mins interval setting, Excerpt 2 : EVA-2311 is powered by 2 AA 3.6v Li-ion batteries, battery life can up till 5 years basing on certain condition., Excerpt 3 : Power Input: 3.6V AA Battery * 2pcs (Not included), Excerpt 4 : Features: LoRaWAN wireless connectivity, Excerpt 5 : Introduction: EVA-2311 is a LoRaWAN PT1000 round head probe sensor.
retrieved_contexts:
EVA‐2311          LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor

# NEW Features

- LoRaWAN wireless connectivity
- -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range
- IP67 for PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor
- Battery life up till 5 years@25°C, 15mins interval setting
- Easy to deploy and maintain

RoHS COMPLIANT 2002/95/EC

# Introduction

EVA-2311 is a LoRaWAN PT1000 round head probe sensor. The extended sensor itself has 2m length cable, IP67 rating design with -70°C to 200°C temperature detection range. It is capable to measure temperature at different kinds of applications, such as refrigerator, freezer, cooling pipe, etc. With its wide range, high penetration rate LoRa connectivity, the data transmission range can be up till hundred or thousand meters away. EVA-2311 can be installed directly on the walls, metal box or poles. EVA-2311 is powered by 2 AA 3.6v Li-ion batteries, battery life can up till 5 years based on certain conditions.

# Common Specification

# Temperature Sensor

| Measurement Range                                        | -70°C to 200°C                                        | | |
| -------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- |---|---|
| Accuracy (Host and Sensor are in same environment)       | ±0.8°C between 0°C and 55°C                           | | |
| Accuracy (Host and Sensor are in different environments) | ±{(0.15 + 0.002\* |T2|)+1}°C between -70°C and 0°C    |
|                                                          | ±{(0.15 + 0.002\* |T2|)+0.6}°C between 55°C and 200°C |

All product specifications are subject to change without notice. Last updated: 19-Apr-2024

# Ordering Information

| LoRaWAN Temperature and Humidity Sensor |                                                                       |
| --------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| EVA-2311-NA                             | LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor - US 902-928 (MHz) |
| EVA-2311-EA                             | LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor - EU 863-870 (MHz) |
| EVA-2311-TA                             | LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor - AS 919-924 (MHz) |
| EVA-2311-ZA                             | LoRaWAN Temperature PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor - AU 915-928 (MHz) |

# LoRaWAN Gateway

# Common Specification

| Wireless Communication |                                                                           | Probe Dimension | 5 x 30 mm           |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------- | ------------------- |
| Frequency Band         | EU 863-870 (MHz) / US 902-928 (MHz) / AU 915-928 (MHz) / AS 919-924 (MHz) | IP Class        | IP67                |
| Spreading Factor       | 7\~12                                                                     | Wire Length     | 2000 mm             |
| Transmit Power         | Up to 20dBm                                                               | Topology        | Star (LoRa/LoRaWAN) |
| Sensitivity            | -148dB                                                                    |                 |                     |

# Ordering Information

The measuring point for the nominal resistance is 2 mm from the end of the sensor body.

# Temperature Range of Tolerance Class

Validity of Class F 0.3 (B) -50 °C to +150 °C

The specified tolerance classes refer to continuous operation.

Short term temperature exposure for soldering: Max. 5 minutes up to 250 °C.

# Dimensions and Tolerances in mm

| L:  | 2.1 -0.2/+0.2  |
| --- | -------------- |
| W1: | 1.9 +0.2       |
| H:  | 0.8 -0.2/+0.25 |
| LL: | 7±1            |
| Lø: | 0.22 ±0.02     |
| W2: | 0.7 ±0.1       |

# Response Time

Air (v = 3 m/s): t0.5 = 1.5 s

t0.9 = 5 s

# Measuring Current

Pt100 Ω: 0.3 to 1 mA

Pt1000 Ω: 0.1 to 0.3 mA (self-heating has to be considered)

Image for illustration purposes only

Color, shape and forming of fixing drop may vary

W2 only valid at outlet spot of wire

YAGEO Nexensos GmbH, Germany Document: 10000002962 Part 001 Version 00 | Status: 03/2025

Web: www.yageo-nexensos.com

Contact: nexensos.america@yageo.com

detailed_results.question: What is the IP rating of the Advantech EVA-2311's probe and its main body?
detailed_results.generated_answer: The Advantech EVA-2311's probe has an IP67 rating, which indicates it is dust-tight and can withstand immersion in water up to 1 meter for 30 minutes. The main body of the sensor also has the same IP67 rating.
detailed_results.ground_truth: The probe of the Advantech EVA-2311 is rated IP67, and the main unit is rated IP30.
detailed_results.expected_response: For the Advantech EVA-2311, the PT1000 round head probe sensor has an IP67 rating, while the main body of the device has an IP30 rating.
detailed_results.expected_contexts: Excerpt 1 : Features: IP67 for PT1000 Round Head Probe Sensor, Excerpt 2 : General: IP Class: IP30, Excerpt 3 : The extended sensor itself has 2m length cable, IP67 rating design., Excerpt 4 : Probe Dimension: 5 x 30 mm, Excerpt 5 : Mounting: Wall, Magnetic, Pole

YAGEO Nexensos

# LS219, Pt Temperature Sensor according to DIN EN IEC 60751

Temperature range -50 °C to +150 °C

Designed for low temperature applications

Optimized for soldering connection

High accuracy and interchangeability

Excellent long term stability and low drift

LS series Pt-RTDs are designed for high volume low temperature applications where long term stability, interchangeability and accuracy are vital. Typical applications include HVAC, Food and Beverage, Medical and Industrial equipment.
